text: An entity may provide limited information via email or via a support request.
Mobile Helix does have access to, nor collect, nor store this information.

When the employee interacts with the Application, the Application may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of device used, the device's unique device ID, the IP address of the device, and the operating system.
The Application does collect metadata (analytics) about the user's activities in the Application so that the hosting entity may use that metadata to determine how the Application is being used.

text: We only have access to/collect information that visitors voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact.

This privacy policy governs the use of the software application, Mobile Helix Link App and System ("Application"), that was created by Mobile Helix, Inc. ("we" or "us").
